00078   enum DataItemFormat {    DataItemFormat_SignedInt     =  0,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT1    =  1,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT2    =  2,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT3    =  3,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT4    =  4,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT5    =  5,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT6    =  6,    DataItemFormat_SignedIntNN   =  7, // NEW in V49.2    DataItemFormat_reserved8     =  8,    DataItemFormat_reserved9     =  9,    DataItemFormat_reserved10    = 10,    DataItemFormat_reserved11    = 11,    DataItemFormat_reserved12    = 12,    DataItemFormat_Float16       = 13, // NEW in V49.2    DataItemFormat_Float         = 14,    DataItemFormat_Double        = 15,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedInt   = 16,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT1  = 17,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT2  = 18,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT3  = 19,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT4  = 20,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT5  = 21,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT6  = 22,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedIntNN = 23, // NEW in V49.2    DataItemFormat_reserved24    = 24,    DataItemFormat_reserved25    = 25,    DataItemFormat_reserved26    = 26,    DataItemFormat_reserved27    = 27,    DataItemFormat_reserved28    = 28,    DataItemFormat_reserved29    = 29,    DataItemFormat_reserved30    = 30,    DataItemFormat_reserved31    = 31
00111   };
00112 
00114   inline bool DataItemFormat_isSigned (DataItemFormat form) {
00115     return ((int32_t)form) < 16;
00116   }
00117 
00119   inline int32_t DataItemFormat_getExponentBits (DataItemFormat form) {
00120     switch (form) {
00121       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT1:   return 1;
00122       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT2:   return 2;
00123       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT3:   return 3;
00124       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT4:   return 4;
00125       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT5:   return 5;
00126       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT6:   return 6;
00127       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT1: return 1;
00128       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT2: return 2;
00129       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT3: return 3;
00130       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT4: return 4;
00131       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT5: return 5;
00132       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT6: return 6;
00133       default: return -1;
00134     }
00135   }
00136 
00138   enum DataType {
00139     // XXX - why the cryptic values? Something related to StandardDataPacket implementation  DataType_Int4       = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00010000),  DataType_Int8       = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00020000),  DataType_Int16      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00030000),  DataType_Int32      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00040000),  DataType_Int64      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00050000),  DataType_Float      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00060000),  DataType_Double     = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00070000),  DataType_UInt1      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00080000),  DataType_UInt4      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00090000),  DataType_UInt8      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA000A0000),  DataType_UInt16     = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA000B0000),  DataType_UInt32     = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA000C0000),  DataType_UInt64     = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA000D0000),
00153     // XXX - Add half-precision float? added to end rather than insert above and shift everything below it
00155   };

00713     public: inline static int32_t getPacketLength (const vector<char> &buf, int32_t off) {
00714       return ((0xFF & ((int32_t)buf[off+2])) << 10) | ((0xFF & ((int32_t)buf[off+3])) << 2);
00715     }

01046     // Pack/Unpack

01049     public: inline void swap (vector<char> *buffer) {
01050       if (buffer == NULL) throw VRTException("Buffer is null");
01051       if (readOnly      ) throw VRTException("Packet is read-only");
01052       bbuf.swap(*buffer);
01053     }
01055     public: inline void swap (BasicVRTPacket *pkt) {
01056       if (pkt  ==  NULL) throw VRTException("Packet is null");
01057       if (readOnly     ) throw VRTException("Packet is read-only");
01058       if (pkt->readOnly) throw VRTException("Packet is read-only");
01059       bbuf.swap(pkt->bbuf);
01060     }

01063     protected: inline void packPayloadByte      (int32_t off, char     val) { VRTMath::packByte(    bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val); }
01065     protected: inline void packPayloadShort     (int32_t off, int16_t  val) { VRTMath::packShort(   bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val); }

01071     protected: inline void packPayloadFloat     (int32_t off, float    val) { VRTMath::packFloat(   bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val); }
01073     protected: inline void packPayloadDouble    (int32_t off, double   val) { VRTMath::packDouble(  bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val); }
01075     protected: inline void packPayloadBoolNull  (int32_t off, boolNull val) { VRTMath::packBoolNull(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val); }
01077     protected: inline void packPayloadBoolean   (int32_t off, bool     val) { VRTMath::packBoolean( bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val); }
01079     protected: inline void packPayloadRecord    (int32_t off, Record   val) { VRTMath::packRecord(  bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val); }
01081     protected: inline void packPayloadMetadata  (int32_t off, MetadataBlock       val, int32_t len      ) { VRTMath::packMetadata( bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, len); }
01083     protected: inline void packPayloadBytes     (int32_t off, const vector<char> &val, int32_t len      ) { VRTMath::packBytes(    bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, len); }
01085     protected: inline void packPayloadBytes     (int32_t off, const void         *val, int32_t len      ) { VRTMath::packBytes(    bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, len); }

01091     protected: inline void packPayloadUUID      (int32_t off, UUID                val                   ) { VRTMath::packUUID(     bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val); }
01092 
01094     protected: inline void packPayloadAscii (int32_t off, string val, int32_t len) {
01095       if (len < 0) { // compute max length
01096         int32_t max = -len;
01097         setPayloadLength(off+max);
01098         int32_t act = VRTMath::packAscii(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, max);
01099         if (act < max) setPayloadLength(off+act);
01100       }
01101       else {
01102         VRTMath::packAscii(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, len);
01103       }
01104     }
01105 
01107     protected: inline void packPayloadUTF8 (int32_t off, wstring val, int32_t len) {
01108       if (len < 0) { // compute max length
01109         int32_t max = -len;
01110         setPayloadLength(off+max);
01111         int32_t act = VRTMath::packUTF8(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, max);
01112         if (act < max) setPayloadLength(off+act);
01113       }
01114       else {
01115         VRTMath::packUTF8(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, len);
01116       }
01117     }
01118 
01120     protected: inline void packPayloadUTF8 (int32_t off, string val, int32_t len) {
01121       if (len < 0) { // compute max length
01122         int32_t max = -len;
01123         setPayloadLength(off+max);
01124         int32_t act = VRTMath::packUTF8(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, max);
01125         if (act < max) setPayloadLength(off+act);
01126       }
01127       else {
01128         VRTMath::packUTF8(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, len);
01129       }
01130     }

01178 #if NOT_USING_JNI
01179 
01200   class PayloadFormat : public VRTObject, public HasFields {
01201     // TODO - there are no reserved bits in V49.2, which is new since V49.0
01202     //      - the bits that were reserved are now Data Item Frac Size
01203 
01204     // Since the values 0x0000000000000000 and 0x8000000000000000 are both valid and
01205     // 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF is invalid, this object uses -1 as the indicator for a null payload format.
01206     private: static const int32_t NULL_VAL_HI = -1; // 0xFFFFFFFFF;   // null value for hi (-1)
01207     private: static const int32_t NULL_VAL_LO = -1; // 0xFFFFFFFFF;   // null value for lo (-1)
01208 
01209     private: int32_t hi; // high-order bits
01210     private: int32_t lo; // low-order bits
01211 
01213     public: PayloadFormat ();
01214 
01216     public: PayloadFormat (const PayloadFormat &pf);
01217 
01223     public: PayloadFormat (DataItemFormat format, int32_t size);
01224 
01231     public: PayloadFormat (RealComplexType type, DataItemFormat format, int32_t size);
01232 
01239     public: PayloadFormat (DataItemFormat format, int32_t size, int32_t fracSize);
01240 
01248     public: PayloadFormat (RealComplexType type, DataItemFormat format, int32_t size, int32_t fracSize);
01249 
01254     public: PayloadFormat (DataType dataType, RealComplexType realComplex=RealComplexType_Real);
01255 
01269     public: PayloadFormat (bool procEfficient, RealComplexType type, DataItemFormat format,
01270                            bool repeating, int32_t eventTagSize, int32_t chanTagSize, int32_t fieldSize,
01271                            int32_t itemSize, int32_t repeatCount, int32_t vectorSize, int32_t fracSize=0);
01272 
01277     public: inline virtual bool isNullValue () const {
01278       return (hi == NULL_VAL_HI)
01279           && (lo == NULL_VAL_LO);
01280     }
01281 
01286     private: inline virtual void clearNull () {
01287       if (isNullValue())
01288         hi = lo = 0;
01289     }
01290 
01292     public: PayloadFormat (int64_t bits);
01293 
01294     public: virtual string toString () const;
01295 
01296     using VRTObject::equals;
01297     public: virtual bool equals (const VRTObject &o) const;
01298 
01302     public: inline bool isValid () const {
01303       return (getValid() == "");
01304     }
01305 
01310     public: virtual string getValid () const;
01311 
01313     public: inline int64_t getBits () const {
01314       return (((int64_t)hi) << 32) | (((int64_t)lo) & __INT64_C(0xFFFFFFFF));
01315     }
01316 
01318     public: inline void setBits (int64_t bits) {
01319       // Note: previously reserved bits were forced to 0, but those bits are now DataItemFracSize
01320       //hi = ((int32_t)(bits >> 32)) & 0xFFFF0FFF;
01321       hi = (int32_t)(bits >> 32);
01322       lo = (int32_t)bits;
01323     }
01324 
01328     public: inline bool isProcessingEfficient () const {
01329       int32_t mask = 0x80000000;
01330       return ((hi & mask) == 0);
01331     }
01332 
01336     public: inline void setProcessingEfficient (bool val) {
01337       clearNull();
01338       int32_t mask = 0x80000000;
01339       int32_t set  = (val)? 0 : mask;
01340       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
01341     }
01342 
01346     public: inline RealComplexType getRealComplexType () const {
01347       int32_t mask = 0x60000000;
01348       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 29;
01349       return (RealComplexType)val;
01350     }
01351 
01356     public: inline void setRealComplexType (RealComplexType val) {
01357       clearNull();
01358       int32_t mask = 0x60000000;
01359       int32_t set  = ((int32_t)val) << 29;
01360       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
01361     }
01362 
01369     public: DataType getDataType () const;
01370 
01376     public: void setDataType (DataType type);
01377 
01381     public: inline bool isComplex () const {
01382       return (getRealComplexType() != RealComplexType_Real);
01383     }
01384 
01388     public: inline bool isSigned () const {
01389       return (getDataItemFormat() < 16);
01390     }
01391 
01395     public: inline DataItemFormat getDataItemFormat () const {
01396       int32_t mask = 0x1F000000;
01397       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 24;
01398       return (DataItemFormat)val;
01399     }
01400 
01405     public: inline void setDataItemFormat (DataItemFormat val) {
01406       clearNull();
01407       int32_t mask = 0x1F000000;
01408       int32_t set  = ((int32_t)val) << 24;
01409       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
01410     }
01411 
01415     public: inline bool isRepeating () const {
01416       int32_t mask = 0x00800000;
01417       return ((hi & mask) != 0);
01418     }
01419 
01423     public: inline void setRepeating (bool val) {
01424       clearNull();
01425       int32_t mask = 0x00800000;
01426       int32_t set  = (val)? mask : 0;
01427       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
01428     }
01429 
01433     public: inline int32_t getEventTagSize () const {
01434       int32_t mask = 0x00700000;
01435       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 20;
01436       return val;
01437     }
01438 
01443     public: inline void setEventTagSize (int32_t val) {
01444       if ((val < 0) || (val > 7)) {
01445         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 0..7", val);
01446       }
01447       clearNull();
01448       int32_t mask = 0x00700000;
01449       int32_t set  = val << 20;
01450       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
01451     }
01452 
01456     public: inline int getChannelTagSize () const {
01457       int32_t mask = 0x000F0000;
01458       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 16;
01459       return val;
01460     }
01461 
01466     public: inline void setChannelTagSize (int32_t val) {
01467       if ((val < 0) || (val > 15)) {
01468         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 0..15", val);
01469       }
01470       clearNull();
01471       int32_t mask = 0x000F0000;
01472       int32_t set  = val << 16;
01473       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
01474     }
01475 
01479     public: inline int32_t getDataItemFracSize () const {
01480       int32_t mask = 0x0000F000;
01481       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 12;
01482       return val;
01483     }
01484 
01489     public: inline void setDataItemFracSize (int32_t val) {
01490       if ((val < 0) || (val > 15)) {
01491         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 0..15", val);
01492       }
01493       clearNull();
01494       int32_t mask = 0x0000F000;
01495       int32_t set  = val << 12;
01496       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
01497     }
01498 
01502     public: inline int32_t getItemPackingFieldSize () const {
01503       int32_t mask = 0x00000FC0;
01504       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 6;
01505       return val+1;
01506     }
01507 
01512     public: inline void setItemPackingFieldSize (int32_t val) {
01513       if ((val < 1) || (val > 64)) {
01514         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 1..64", val);
01515       }
01516       clearNull();
01517       int32_t mask = 0x00000FC0;
01518       int32_t set  = (val-1) << 6;
01519       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
01520     }
01521 
01525     public: inline int32_t getDataItemSize () const {
01526       int32_t mask = 0x0000003F;
01527       int32_t val  = (hi & mask);
01528       return val+1;
01529     }
01530 
01535     public: inline void setDataItemSize (int32_t val) {
01536       if ((val < 1) || (val > 64)) {
01537         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 1..64", val);
01538       }
01539       clearNull();
01540       int32_t mask = 0x0000003F;
01541       int32_t set  = (val-1);
01542       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
01543     }
01544 
01548     public: inline int32_t getRepeatCount () const {
01549       return (0x0000FFFF&(lo >> 16))+1;
01550     }
01551 
01556     public: inline void setRepeatCount (int32_t val) {
01557       if ((val < 1) || (val > 65536)) {
01558         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 1..65536", val);
01559       }
01560       clearNull();
01561       lo = (((val-1) << 16) | (lo & 0x0000FFFF));
01562     }
01563 
01567     public: inline int32_t getVectorSize () const {
01568       return (lo & 0x0000FFFF)+1;
01569     }
01570 
01575     public: inline void setVectorSize (int32_t val) {
01576       if ((val < 1) || (val > 65536)) {
01577         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 1..65536", val);
01578       }
01579       clearNull();
01580       lo = ((val-1) | (lo & 0xFFFF0000));
01581     }
01582 
01584     // Implement HasFields
01586     public: virtual int32_t   getFieldCount () const;
01587     public: virtual string    getFieldName  (int32_t id) const;
01588     public: virtual ValueType getFieldType  (int32_t id) const;
01589     public: virtual Value*    getField      (int32_t id) const __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
01590     public: virtual void      setField      (int32_t id, const Value* val);
01591   };
01592 #endif /* NOT_USING_JNI */
